contest-event.event-date:
July 20, 1889 D Hollinwood Contest
Hollinwood Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
hollinwood-contest
None
Excelsior [Round]
Hollinwood, Oldham, Lancashire March contest - 1st Oldham Rifles, 2nd Chadderton. Prizes - 1st £7.8s.6d and cornet, 2nd £5 and tenor horn, 3rd £3 and trombone, 4th £3, 5th £1. 2nd annual contest promoted by Hollinwood United band. 8 bands competed.
Dec. 1, 2017, 10:58 a.m. Nov. 3, 2019, 10:53 a.m.
1 Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen
2 Clayton le Moors Alexander Owen
3 Denton Original Joseph Ford
4 Audenshaw and Droylsden Joseph Frith
5 Boarshurst Silver Band Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Chadderton Brass Band Unknown
